name: Puddinq Dashboard
author: Stefan Schotvanger

sections.description:
Puddinq Dashboard is a lightweight facelift for the admin dashboard. Hide widgets, customeize styling.

  • Hide widgets
  • Change logo in adminbar
  • Change the color of the dashboard
  • Change widget bead and body color

Translations

  • English : English
  • Dutch: Nederlands

Additional Info

Just a little leightweight plugin…

Credits

  • Thanx to Stefan Schotvanger
sections.installation:
3 ways

  • Use the plugin upload functionality to upload the zip and install the plugin.
  • Extract to contents of the zip to the plugins directory of your installation.
  • Find the plugin and press install (WordPress plugins)
sections.faq:
Does it have a frontend effect?

Aprt from the admin bar, visible at the frondend (logo option)
No, the plugin is only active in the backend.

How can I undo all?

If you deactivate the plugin all settings are removed.
sections.changelog:
0.1.1

  • Check for WordPress 5.4

0.1.0

  • Version confusion

0.0.9

  • Compability check WordPress 5.2

  • Compability check

0.0.7

  • Select your custom colors with colorselectors
  • Reset colors to puddinq default

0.0.6

  • First optional puddinq dashboard widget with custom piture.
  • Media upload field fill dashboard widget

0.0.5

  • Media upload field to replace logo

0.0.4

  • Corrected settings field

0.0.3

  • Checks for all widgets
  • All widgets can be blocked

0.0.2

  • Nicer settingsscreen
  • Better code (no errors)
  • Better descriptions (phpdoc)

0.0.1

  • Settings screen
  • Initial functions
  • Tested
